infos.value: Vinera... Would you please accompany me outside?
W-we cannot, Lord Dario!
Th-that's right!
I do not wish to be here anymore.
This castle... It has been more like a prison for me.
I beg of you, Vinera. Quickly...please hurry.
...As you wish.
W-we've already said that we can't!
It seems like we've dealt with the main force, but staying inside the castle is clearly safer!
If we go outside, we don't know where an attack could come from!
My apologies, Tyrrell. Please...cover us.
...O-okay.
I wonder...how Machérie is doing?
Surely...she's with King Muraga and has been wed to him.
She cried nonstop for three days and three nights when it was decided that she would be wed to Muraga.
The brave and tough Machérie...cried.
Seeing that felt as if my heart broke within my chest...
...because part of the blame fell on me.
Why would that be?
Do you know the reason why our father decided to create an alliance with Fennes?
...Because of the threat of Rundall to the east?
Of course, that is part of the reason. However...
My continued refusal to set foot on the battlefield was certainly a primary factor as well.
That is why...
I am sorry, Machérie. Please forgive your cowardly brother.
No, Lord Dario. I have also committed wrongdoings.
If I had told you the truth sooner that I am not actually Muraga's daughter...
Heh heh heh. You can't get away!
Dario is nothing but a hindrance now!
I'll deal with you traitors right here!
